EmailTemplate.name: VHM - OpenStack Webcast
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar - OpenStack Challenges and Advantages
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-resources/webinar-openstack-primetime-the-state-of-open-clouds-2015?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=openstackwcast> {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, A fundamental shift in IT is almost upon us â€“ and OpenStack is leading the way. Download this free webinar and hear from Eric Wright and Kenneth Hui as they discuss the OpenStack Summit, and how OpenStack and open source ecosystems are becoming a powerful part of today's enterprise environments. Straight off of the 11th release of OpenStack (Kilo) they discuss the challenges and advantages of this fast growing open cloud environment. - The VMTurbo Team <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-resources/webinar-openstack-primetime-the-state-of-open-clouds-2015?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vhm_love&utm_content=openstackwcast>
